IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: MOUNTAIN PROJECTS COMMUNITY ACTION AGENCY CHANGES PEOPLE'S LIVES, EMBODIES THE SPIRIT OF HOPE, IMPROVES COMMUNITIES, AND MAKES HAYWOOD AND JACKSON COUNTIES A BETTER PLACE TO LIVE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: MOUNTAIN PROJECTS COMMUNITY ACTION AGENCY CHANGES PEOPLE'S LIVES, EMBODIES THE SPIRIT OF HOPE, IMPROVES COMMUNITIES, AND MAKES HAYWOOD AND JACKSON COUNTIES A BETTER PLACE TO LIVE.
IRS990.Desc: ASSIST LOW-INCOME, CHALLENGED, & OLDER PERSONS TO SECURE QUALITY HOUSING BY SUBSIDIZED RENTS & UTILITES FOR 800 UNITS/MONTH. A FEE IS CHARGED TO FUND THE OPERATION OF THE PROGRAM.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: COMPREHENSIVE CHILD DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM (HEAD START) FOR 177 (121 HEAD START AND 56 EARLY HEAD START) LOW-INCOME CHILDREN & THEIR FAMILIES. NO FEE IS CHARGED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: A FOOD SERVICE PROGRAM FOR THE PREPARATION OF MEALS FOR OTHER PROGRAMS OF THE ORGANIZATION. A FEE IS CHARGED; SERVED 100,000 MEALS DURING THE YEAR.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: HOUSING - PERFORM MAJOR RENOVATION WORK ON HOMES OF LOWER INCOME PERSONS TO IMPROVE HOUSING QUALITY. NO FEE IS CHARGED. 5 HOMES SERVED THIS YEAR; AFFORDABLE HOUSING RENTAL - PROVIDE AFFORDABLE HOUSING UNITS. EXPENSES TOTAL 71,289. WEATHERIZATION - PROVIDE ASSISTANCE IN SELF-HELP HOUSING. SERVED 140 UNITS DURING THE YEAR. EXPENSES TOTAL 1,180,430. OLDER AMERICAN - ASSISTS ELDERLY WITH PHYSICAL AND NUTRITIONAL NEEDS. SERVED 4,079 PERSONS DURING YEAR. EXPENSES 526,766. CORPORATION FOR NATIONAL SERVICE - PROMOTES PEOPLE BECOMING INVOLVED AS VOLUNTEERS WHILE ASSISTING IN NEEDED AREAS SUCH AS DAYCARES. 76 VOLUNTEERS SERVED DURING THE YEAR. EXPENSES 403,904. COMMUNITY SERVICES BLOCK PROGRAM - PROGRAM FUNDS CENTRAL INTAKE OPERATIONS AND CASE WORKERS. SERVED OVER 1,087 PERSONS DURING THE YEAR. EXPENSES 264,023. PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM - PROVIDES PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION FOR HAYWOOD CTY CITIZENS. SERVED 36,250 PASSENGERS FOR THE YEAR. EXPENSES 1,238,938. NAVIGATOR PROGRAM: PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO LOW INCOME INDIVIDUALS IN OBTAINING AFFORDABLE HEALTH INSURANCE COVERAGE. SERVED 1,931 PERSONS DURING THE YEAR. EXPENSES 126,953. PREVENTION SERVICES: THIS PROGRAM PROVIDES ADULT AND YOUTH COUNSELING FOCUSED ON THE PREVENTION OF SUBSTANCE ABUSE. SERVED 266,450 PEOPLE. EXPENSES 268,545. WORKFORCE OPPORTUNITY ACT: SERVED 34 PEOPLE. PROVIDES ACCESS TO EMPLOYEMENT, EDUCATION, TRAINING, AND SUPPORT SERVICES TO JOB SEEKERS. EXPENSES 123,608. SMOKEY MOUNTAIN HOUSING-DEVELOP LOTS AND CONSTRUCT HOMES TO BE SOLD TO ELIGIBLE LOW INCOME HOUSEHOLDS. 2 HOMES SOLD AND 11 HOMES IN DEVELOPMENT. EXPENSES 129,202. HEALTHY OPPORTUNITIES PILOT - OMPREHENSIVE PROGRAM TO EVALUATE NON MEDICAL INTERVENTINS RELATED TO HOUSING, FOOD AND TRANSPORTATION FOR MEDICAID ENROLLEES. SERVED 136 PEOPLE. EXPENSES 310,104.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MOUNTAIN PROJECTS, INC. IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION AND HAS BEEN RECOGNIZED AS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND DOES NOT RECORD A PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES. THE CORPORATION RECORDS AN IMMATERIAL AMOUNT OF INCOME FROM CERTAIN ACTIVITIES NOT DIRECTLY RELATED TO THE CORPORATION'S TAX-EXEMPT PURPOSE THAT IS SUBJECT TO TAXATION AS UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME; HOWEVER THE NET AMOUNT RECORDED IS A LOSS. THE CORPORATION REGULARLY REVIEWS AND EVALUATES ITS TAX POSITIONS TAKEN IN PREVIOUSLY FILED INFORMATION RETURNS AND IN ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, WITH REGARD TO ISSUES AFFECTING ITS TAX-EXEMPT STATUS, UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME, AND RELATED MATTERS. THE CORPORATION BELIEVES THAT IN THE EVENT OF AN EXAMINATION BY TAXATION AUTHORITIES, ITS POSITION WOULD PREVAIL. THEREFORE, THE CORPORATION HAS CONCLUDED THAT NO TAX BENEFITS OR LIABILITIES ARE REQUIRED TO BE RECOGNIZED. THE CORPORATION'S TAX YEARS OPEN TO EXAMINATION BY AUTHORITIES INCLUDE 2020, 2021, AND 2022.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES NUMEROUS FEDERAL AND STATE GRANTS. EACH OF THESE GRANTS HAS RULES AND REGULATIONS ON HOW AND TO WHOM MONIES CAN BE DISBURSED. THE MANAGER OF EACH OF THESE PROGRAMS MONITORS HOW THE GRANT MONEY IS BEING DISBURSED. THEY ARE CHARGED WITH THE RESPONSIBILITY TO MAKE SURE THEY ARE IN COMPLIANCE WITH THESE GRANTS. IN ADDITION, THE FEDERAL AND STATE AGENCIES MONITOR THEIR RESPECTIVE GRANTS. THE ORGANIZATION UNDERGOES A YEARLY SINGLE AUDIT UNDER THE UNIFORM GUIDANCE. ALL CLIENTS OF THE ORGANIZATION MUST GO THROUGH THE CENTAL INTAKE DEPARTMENT TO DETERMINE IF THEY ARE ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE ASSISTANCE. THEY THEN GO TO THE RESPECTIVE PROGRAM OR DEPARTMENT TO SEE IF THERE ARE ANY ADDITIONAL ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS THEY NEED TO FULFILL.

HOUSING - PERFORM MAJOR RENOVATION WORK ON HOMES OF LOWER INCOME PERSONS TO IMPROVE HOUSING QUALITY. NO FEE IS CHARGED. 5 HOMES SERVED THIS YEAR; AFFORDABLE HOUSING RENTAL - PROVIDE AFFORDABLE HOUSING UNITS. EXPENSES TOTAL 71,289. WEATHERIZATION - PROVIDE ASSISTANCE IN SELF-HELP HOUSING. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEW FORM 990 AT NEXT MEETING AND MANAGEMENT INTERNALLY REVIEWS IT.
OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES MUST SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ANNUALLY AND REPORT ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE LOOKS AT THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION AND MAKES A RECOMMENDATION FOR A RAISE. IT IS USUALLY ABOUT A 3% RAISE. SALARY SURVEYS ARE USED TO MAKE SURE THE COMPENSATION IS IN LINE WITH OTHER NON-PROFITS. THE INDIRECT COST BUDGET IS ALSO REVIEWED TO MAKE SURE THE RAISE IS AFFORDABLE.

THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR REVIEWS COMPENSATION FOR ALL KEY EMPLOYEES AND DECIDES RAISES BASED ON JOB RESPONSIBILITIES, LENGTH OF SERVICE, WAGE SURVEYS, ETC. BIGGEST CONSIDERATION IS ALWAYS WHAT CAN BE AFFORDED ON A PER PROGRAM BASIS.

GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO STAFF, FUNDING SOURCES AND BOARD MEMBERS AS NEEDED. CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY IS AVAILABLE TO EACH STAFF PERSON, BOARD OF DIRECTOR, AND FUNDING SOURCE AS REQUIRED. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE SAME INDIVIDUALS AND ORGANIZATIONS. THE ANNUAL AUDIT REPORT IS AVAILABLE TO ANYONE WHO REQUESTS.
